revised_title: The Absorption of y-Rays in Lead Emitted by Radium B and Radium C
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption of y-rays emitted by radium B and radium C in lead. They find that both radium B and radium C emit three types of radiation, which are exponentially absorbed. The results are in agreement with previous studies on the spectrum of the penetrating y-rays from radium B and radium C.
